features: 3 BALLS WITHOUT HOLES & STRONG SUCTIONS CUP: Our basketball bath toy set has 3 balls (no holes and mold free ) that are a pleasure to play with. The bathtub basketball hoop for kids comes with two strong suction cups that stick to any flat surface, presented in a Gift-Ready Box.

KEEP YOUR TODDLER ENTERTAINED: Help your baby develop an interest in sports from an early age. While in the tub, encourage him or her to score the ball in the hoop. Congratulate him every time he does it, and he will improve his motor skills, coordination, and precision in no time. Keep your toddler entertained with these toddler sports toys for boys and girls.

FUN TODDLER BATH TOYS FOR BOYS AND GIRLS: Looking at bath toys for toddlers or toddler gifts? Our bath basketball hoop is exactly what you are looking for. The bathtub basketball hoop is designed for little kids, baby, boys, or girls who enjoy playing time and super-fun activities. Make bath time fun and enjoyable.

BATHTIME TOYS ACTIVITY: We created this bath toy for kids having in mind toddlers from 3 years old, but you are never too old to play a basketball shooting game or to score a slam dunk with your baby. The bath basketball hoop offers endless possibilities to have fun with these bath toys. Use these bathtub toys for toddlers to play with your family and spend quality time together.

SAFE & FUN: Our baby bath toys are made from high-quality materials. This basketball bath toy set comes with 3 basketball balls (no holes & mold free), 1 easy-to-use basketball hoop, presented in a Gift-Ready Box. We pride ourselves with excellent customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you looking at bath toys for toddlers or toddler gifts? Our bath basketball hoop is exactly what you are looking for. The bathtub basketball hoop is dedicated and designed for little kids, boys, or girls who enjoy playing time and super-fun activities. Make bath time fun and enjoyable.

ENCOURAGE THE LITTLE ONE While the little one is in the tub, encourage him to score the ball in the circle. Praise him every time he does it and he'll improve his motor skills, coordination, and accuracy in no time. FUN IN THE TUB Bath Basketball Hoop attracts the child's attention, and you can play together. After scoring several times or while playing, the mother can wash the baby's head. This bath basket can be used anywhere. Inside or outside. The possibilities are endless SCORE MORE AND MORE Now, the child has the opportunity to concentrate and have fun during the bath. From one day to the next, they will improve their scoring performance, and the light balls offer a pleasant sensation to the touch.

PERFECT DIMENSIONS & EASY TO USE The dimensions of 5.5 in x 5.5 in x 2 in, are perfect for a small child. The bathtub basketball hoop for kids comes with two strong suction cups that stick to any flat surface. The edges are smooth and the two suction cups make the basket easy to install on any smooth surface and ready to use at any time 3 BALLS WITHOUT HOLES Marppy bath basketball toy set included 3 balls. These balls are specially designed for toddlers. They have no holes to prevent water from entering, they are light and have a sensory texture. The size is perfect for little ones. SMOOTH EDGE AND 2 STRONG SUCTION CUP The edges are smooth and the two suction cups make the basket easy to install on any smooth surface and ready to use at any time
Bath Basketball Hoop with 4 Soft Balls Bath Basketball Hoop with 4 Soft Balls Bath Basketball Hoop with 4 Soft Balls Balls 4 inflatable balls 4 inflatable balls 4 inflatable balls Storage Toy ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun & great quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Have been very pleased w suction quality & the sturdy yet flexible basket. 3 textured balls (no holes, no mold!) great for little hands. This has been a hit for our 1 1/2 yo grandson. Nicely sticks to other surfaces like the fridge and trashcan (see photo). Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sticks to the wall well
reviews.reviewText: Sticks well, but still easy enough to remove that my daughter can move it around if she wants to. The basketballs are the perfect size for little hands, with no holes that the water can get in and cause mold. Should be easy enough to keep clean also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and fun for bathtime
reviews.reviewText: Sticks on the wall well and good for interacting during bathtime. For the price you can’t go wrong. Comes with 3 balls in the set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy toddler entertainment
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. One of the easiest bath toys to keep your toddlers busy in the bath. We love that there are no holes in the ball to collect water leading to mold. The suction has held up since sticking onto the bath wall. I wasn’t expecting it to come with a net to store while not using, that was a great touch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Bath Toy
reviews.reviewText: My cousin requested mold free bath toys as Christmas presents for her one year old. They love this little set! She plays with it every night at bath time. We are pretty impressed at how well it has held up to her multiple, nightly dunks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Bath Toy!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves the bath and finding toys to keep him occupied in it wasn’t easy. This is perfect and he plays with it the whole time. Highly recommend for toddlers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sticks to the shower wall well, and my son loves to play with it!
